content.en: Enhancing wireless communication: Deep learning algorithms are being explored to improve signal detection in various aspects of wireless communication systems. These algorithms, such as MMNet and DLNet, are showing promising results in enhancing the performance and efficiency of MIMO (multiple-input multiple-output) systems. They offer improved decoding performance, lower complexity, and faster convergence, making them valuable tools in the development of 5G and massive MIMO technologies. However, further research is needed to fully understand their strengths, weaknesses, and challenges in order to optimize their application in MIMO detection.
content.da: Forbedring af trådløs kommunikation: Deep learning-algoritmer undersøges for at forbedre signaldetektion i forskellige aspekter af trådløse kommunikationssystemer. Disse algoritmer, såsom MMNet og DLNet, viser lovende resultater i forbedringen af ydeevne og effektivitet af MIMO (multiple-input multiple-output) systemer. De tilbyder forbedret dekoderingsydelse, lavere kompleksitet og hurtigere konvergens, hvilket gør dem til værdifulde værktøjer i udviklingen af 5G og massive MIMO-teknologier. Der er dog behov for yderligere forskning for fuldt ud at forstå deres styrker, svagheder og udfordringer for at optimere deres anvendelse i MIMO-detektion.
